article_title: Canon City High School graduates look toward future
article_text:
Print Email Font Resize Font Resize Canon City High School graduates look toward future

Anna LaCroix takes a selfie with school board member Larry Oddo while receiving her diploma Saturday at Cañon City High School. (Carie Canterbury / Daily Record) Carissa Harlow, Cameron Handeland and Elise Green during graduation Saturday at Cañon City High School. C (Carie Canterbury / Daily Record)

Jared Mews during graduation Saturday at Cañon City High School. (Carie Canterbury / Daily Record)



Michael Madone takes a selfie with principal Brett Meuli during graduation Saturday at Cañon City High School. (Carie Canterbury / Daily Record)

Graduation Saturday at Cañon City High School. (Carie Canterbury / Daily Record)

During graduation Saturday at Cañon City High School. (Carie Canterbury / Daily Record)

Kaylan Miller during graduation Saturday at Cañon City High School. (Carie Canterbury / Daily Record)
